title: metrics: some minor bugs have side effects to observability
body:
## Bug Report
Tks for #15857, it brought a convenient tool for auto-gen metrics in grafana.
However, the newly introduced auto-gen metrics in `tikv_details.json` has some bugs on the present of some panels.
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/18441614/e47a655d-2be4-450c-9677-efb8385b8f16)
And it should add one extra filter:
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/18441614/ec91ba98-93de-4cf5-9cc8-02a17c1f420f)


<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
nightly - 1afb327c6d2a650ddac0e506e2d4727ebad78eb0
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/18441614/21d32e90-9b94-4714-ab2c-b4f7faf3920d)


### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
Macos

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

### What did you expect?
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/18441614/f5a6788a-5888-4457-a315-1d375d80d7fe)

### What did happened?
As belows show.
